document.full_text: the majority republican minnesota senate on monday voted to restrict abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in medical emergencies, a measure expected to be vetoed by democratic governor mark dayton.
document.title: minnesota senate bans abortions after 20 weeks, veto seen
lines_and_colors: the majority republican minnesota senate on monday voted to restrict abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in medical emergencies, a measure expected to be vetoed by democratic governor mark dayton.
